description: An AI that plays poker in an existing game: card detection with YOLO, data analysis in Python, and decision-making with GPT.

paragraphs: This AI poker bot combines computer vision and machine learning to play poker autonomously. Using YOLO for real-time card detection, it analyzes the game state with precision and makes strategic decisions.

The system integrates Python for data processing and GPT for intelligent decision-making, considering pot odds, player patterns, and optimal betting strategies. A fascinating exploration of AI in gaming contexts.
